name: MIS Social Care Case Note Report EN test
description:
Returns those Prisoners who have had the chosen Case Note Sub Type entered on to their record between the dates and Establishment specified at run time.
Please Note: As this report uses the Case Note Establishment to retrieve the data, any case notes prior to 08/12/2018 (before this was recorded) will not be displayed in the report.
PDD0109 v00.00.01 10/07/2019

dataset.name: Case note
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_CASE_NOTE_STAFF_MEMBER.LAST_NAME || ', ' || AT_CASE_NOTE_STAFF_MEMBER.FIRST_NAME AS CASE_NOTE_CREATED_BY, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_TIME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE, AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CREATE_TIME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_MEMBER AT_CASE_NOTE_STAFF_MEMBER, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_STAFF_MEMBER.STAFF_MEMBER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.STAFF_MEMBER_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'TASK_SUBTYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT SAC.CASELOAD_ID FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC WHERE SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_))) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-07-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('02-07-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE = 'IEP_WARN')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DAY_DATE, CASE_NOTE_CREATED_BY, CONTACT_TIME, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, CODE, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION AS V_CURRENTLOCATION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Current Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: dataset::resolveCTEs parse error for : $ref:V_CURRENTLOCATION :: ReferenceError: error is not defined
Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
